lead_paragraph: Striker Lucas Perez faces six to eight weeks on the sidelines with an ankle injury, but midfielder Aaron Ramsey is in contention to make his long-awaited return against Sunderland, manager Arsene Wenger said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Perez Out for Up to Two Months, Ramsey Back for Arsenal
headline.main: Perez Out for Up to Two Months, Ramsey Back for Arsenal

snippet: Striker Lucas Perez faces six to eight weeks on the sidelines with an ankle injury, but midfielder Aaron Ramsey is in contention to make his long-awaited return against Sunderland, manager Arsene Wenger said on Friday....
